resources.string: Please accept all the permissions.\n otherwise the app wont work correctly
Please make this app the default Call app and accept permissions\nThere will be a dialog asking for it you need to accept it

This app needs to be the default call app in order to to modify/read/write the blacklisted contacts.\nAfter importing the blacklisted numbers, you need to revert this. There will be instructions in the last step
Write/Read Files - In order to create the file to export and to read that file to insert the blacklisted contacts
Open this app in the old phone and press the EXPORT button
Select a folder and name and wait a little and this will create a file in the selected folder and will pop a SHARE menu
You need to move the file created on the old phone to the new one. We suggest you do it in one of this ways:
Using the Share menu, send the file via email to yourself
Open the email app in the new phone
Open the message and download the file, the file will be located in the DOWNLOAD folder
Connect your old phone to a PC
Move to the DOWNLOAD folder inside your phone, locate the file "contacts_blacklist.json" and copy it to your PC (remember where you paste it)
Connect your new phone to a PC
Move the file from the location you save it inside your PC to your new phone DOWNLOAD folder(usually PHONE->Internal Storage->Download)
Press the IMPORT button, select the file on the folder you put it and wait for the loader to disappear and we are done
You now have all your blocked numbers on the new phone
Click on the app icon on the toolbar to go to Settings and change the Default PHONE APP back to the previous one
Check the instruction and follow them to import this file in your new phone
File doesn\'t exist, check the instructions
